actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 163 of the Federal-Aid Highway Act of 1973 relating to railroad-highway crossings and section 130 of title 23 of the United States Code relating to railway-highway crossings.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to carry out a demonstration project in Metairie, Jefferson Parish, Louisiana, for the relocation of rail lines in order to eliminate specified ground level railroad highway crossings.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 163 of the Federal-Aid Highway Act of 1973 relating to railroad-highway crossings and section 130 of title 23 of the United States Code relating to railway-highway crossings.
